desc: The Perfect Bathrobe by Wakanicci is a luxury bathrobe redesigned from the ground up. It is made from 100% cotton terry on the inside and an elegant waffle cotton on the outside. It is a perfect length and cut. We hope this robe will help you be a little more present, grounded, and at peace when you’re home.

layout.text: The Coziest Moment of Your Life is Just a Bathrobe Away
Designed from the ground up with super-soft ultra-luxury 100% cotton terry and thoughtful design tweaks, The Perfect Bathrobe is the ultra-luxury upgrade of the classic spa robe.
